Name: Alpha Zylon
About the game: Take out dozens of enemies, traps and other dangers with your knife, hand gun, machine gun, grenade launcher, satchel charges or sniper rifle! 6 varying levels taking place in the desert, jungle or city! Fast action 3D platform gaming with classic 2D gameplay!
